content.text: Match ends, Valencia 1, Almería 2.
Second Half ends, Valencia 1, Almería 2.
Foul by Sergio Canales (Valencia).
Ramón Azeez (Almería) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sergio Canales (Valencia).
Aleix Vidal (Almería) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Hélder Postiga (Valencia) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right.

Daniel Parejo (Valencia).
